name: St. Catherine of Genoa

locations.description: Mystic and hospital administrator in Genoa, known for her writings on purgatory

summary: Catherine of Genoa was an Italian mystic and hospital administrator who experienced profound mystical union with God. Her writings, particularly 'Treatise on Purgatory' and 'Dialogues on the Soul and Body', are considered important works of Catholic mysticism. She dedicated her life to serving the sick and poor in Genoa.
